function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Unhygienic conditions in wet markets","Impact":"Facilitates the spread of contagious diseases like SARS-CoV-2","Mitigation":"Implementation of strict hygiene standards, regular disinfection, and proper waste management","Technologies":"Disinfection systems, waste management technologies","People":"Workers in wet markets, visitors to wet markets","Owner":"Market owners, government health authorities"},{"Description":"Global circulation of SARS-CoV-2","Impact":"Creates a public health emergency and increases the risk of widespread transmission","Mitigation":"International cooperation, travel restrictions, mass testing and vaccination campaigns","Technologies":"Diagnostic testing tools, vaccine development technologies","People":"Governments, health authorities, scientists, citizens","Owner":"International health organizations, governments"},{"Description":"Inability to accommodate increasing COVID-19 cases in hospitals","Impact":"Overwhelms healthcare systems and increases the risk of virus transmission in healthcare settings","Mitigation":"Implementation of alternative care facilities, telemedicine, and community health interventions","Technologies":"Telemedicine platforms, remote monitoring devices","People":"Healthcare workers, patients, community members","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, government health authorities"}]}
